original_email.subject: Quarterly Review Meeting - Action Items
original_email.body:
Dear Team,

Following our quarterly review meeting held on November 5th, I am writing to confirm the action items discussed:

1. Finalize Q4 budget projections by November 15th
2. Submit departmental reports by November 20th
3. Schedule follow-up meetings with key stakeholders

Please acknowledge receipt of this email and confirm your availability for the follow-up session.

Best regards,
Margaret Thompson
Chief Operations Officer
